name: Ankita Thakur
wishText: May the Happiness and Prosperity always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what PSIS was going to do.
text4: We realised, PSIS wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell us if you liked it.
